results.overview: Smart, sarcastic and a little dead inside, Wednesday Addams investigates twisted mysteries while making new friends — and foes — at Nevermore Academy.
results.name: Wednesday

results.overview: The story of the Baladro sisters, known as “Las Poquianchis”, who built a brothel empire and became merciless killers in 1960s Mexico.
results.name: The Dead Girls

results.overview: Hundreds of cash-strapped players accept a strange invitation to compete in children's games. Inside, a tempting prize awaits — with deadly high stakes.
results.name: Squid Game

results.overview: A stripper's fate takes a turn when she crosses paths with the wealthy, dysfunctional family behind a cosmetics dynasty and a devious trafficking scheme.
results.name: Beauty in Black

results.overview: When a young boy vanishes, a small town uncovers a mystery involving secret experiments, terrifying supernatural forces, and one strange little girl.
results.name: Stranger Things

results.overview: Bored and unhappy as the Lord of Hell, Lucifer Morningstar abandoned his throne and retired to Los Angeles, where he has teamed up with LAPD detective Chloe Decker to take down criminals. But the longer he's away from the underworld, the greater the threat that the worst of humanity could escape.
results.name: Lucifer

results.overview: A dangerously charming, intensely obsessive young man goes to extreme measures to insert himself into the lives of those he is transfixed by.
results.name: You

results.original_name: Halva Malmö består av killar som dumpat mig
results.overview: Amanda and her friends face the complexities of modern dating on apps and in bars, meeting a wide array of men but struggling to move past first dates.
results.name: Diary of a Ditched Girl

results.overview: In this high-stakes drama, an ambitious outsider and his friends navigate the chaotic, larger-than-life, yet uncertain world of Bollywood.
results.name: The Ba***ds of Bollywood

results.original_name: My Life with the Walter Boys
results.overview: When a tragedy disrupts her life, a teen moves in with her guardian's big family in a small town and learns new lessons about love, hope and friendship.
results.name: My Life with the Walter Boys

results.overview: Inexperienced Otis channels his sex therapist mom when he teams up with rebellious Maeve to set up an underground sex therapy clinic at school.
results.name: Sex Education

results.overview: With the aid of unexpected friends, a gifted but introverted student confronts bullies and violent foes — unaware of how dangerous his world will become.
results.name: Weak Hero

results.overview: Twisted tales run wild in this mind-bending anthology series that reveals humanity's worst traits, greatest innovations and more.
results.name: Black Mirror

results.overview: A tight-knit group of teens unearths a long-buried secret, setting off a chain of illicit events that takes them on an adventure they'll never forget.
results.name: Outer Banks

results.overview: Actor Charlie Sheen tells his story in this candid two-part documentary tracing his dazzling Hollywood rise, tabloid-topping fall and road to recovery.
results.name: aka Charlie Sheen

results.overview: This Karate Kid sequel series picks up 30 years after the events of the 1984 All Valley Karate Tournament and finds Johnny Lawrence on the hunt for redemption by reopening the infamous Cobra Kai karate dojo. This reignites his old rivalry with the successful Daniel LaRusso, who has been working to maintain the balance in his life without mentor Mr. Miyagi.
results.name: Cobra Kai

results.overview: A regularly scheduled, live, year-round program featuring some of the biggest WWE Superstars.
results.name: Raw

results.overview: As humans turn into savage monsters and the world plunges into terror, a handful of survivors fight for their lives — and to hold on to their humanity.
results.name: Sweet Home

results.overview: At a career-defining moment, a governor's child vanishes. Torn between ambition and family secrets, he must choose: politics or his daughter's safety.
results.name: Maledictions

results.overview: When three working class kids enroll in the most exclusive school in Spain, the clash between the wealthy and the poor students leads to tragedy.
results.name: Elite
